summary: After being drafted into military service, a Polish student spends his last day coming to terms with his estranged wife, visiting old friends, and savoring some last moments of freedom.
cast: Jerzy Skolimowski|Elzbieta Czyzewska|Tadeusz Minc|Andrzej Zarnecki|Jacek Szczek
keywords: written and directed by cast member
title: Rysopis
